name: Clear Plan
description:
Story background:

During the Warring States period, you got lost and broke into the forest.

But I found a large number of monsters in the forest.

You, who have a strong sense of justice, have decided to kill all the monsters in this forest.

How do you fight against a large number of monsters?

Operation mode

WASD Mobile

Left Mouse Button - Attack

Game Features

Large map waiting for you to explore

Use a variety of weapons as you please

You can use different weapons to help yourself complete the kill and switch freely.

Monsters are your target of destruction, protect this world well.
Game features:

In the game, you can obtain different knives and swords, and experience the feeling of different weapons.

The tense and stimulating rhythm makes the palms sweat at any time.

Explore the vast map

Players use various weapons to confront enemies.
